aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident Near McAllen, TX
The accident site had Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was night/bright.
The observation facility was MFE.
MFE is located at an elevation of 107 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was 1 nautical miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 17:53 local time.
The observation facility was 226° from the accident site.
The lowest cloud condition was few clouds at 2100 feet above ground level.
Visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
There was no ceiling at the accident site.
The wind speed was 15 knots.
Wind gusts were 21 knots.
The wind direction was 150°.
The altimeter setting was 29.89 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 24°C.
The dew point was 19°C.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was McAllen, TX.
The departure airport code was KMFE.
The flight plan filed was Company Visual Flight Rules (VFR).
The destination was Laredo, TX.
No clearance was issued for the flight.
The departure time was 19:49 local time.
The airspace was Class D.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site:
- Visual (VMC)
- Condition of Light: Night/bright

## Observation Facility, Elevation:
- MFE,107 ft msl
- Distance from Accident Site: 1 Nautical Miles

## Observation Time:
- 17:53 Local
- Direction from Accident Site: 226°

## Lowest Cloud Condition:
- Few / 2100 ft AGL
- Visibility: 10 miles

## Lowest Ceiling:
- None
- Visibility (RVR):

## Wind Speed/Gusts:
- 15 knots / 21 knots
- Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual:
  - /

## Wind Direction:
- 150°
- Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual:
  - /

## Altimeter Setting:
- 29.89 inches Hg
- Temperature/Dew Point: 24°C / 19°C

## Precipitation and Obscuration:
- No Obscuration; No Precipitation

## Departure Point:
- McAllen, TX (KMFE)
- Type of Flight Plan Filed: Company VFR

## Destination:
- Laredo, TX
- Type of Clearance: None

## Departure Time:
- 19:49 Local
- Type of Airspace: Class D
